message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration, we've decided to offer it to you at an exclusive price of $750000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let us know if you're interested.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the exclusivity of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $650000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. In light of your proposal, we would like to counter with a price of $700000. We believe this offers a fair compromise while still providing value to you.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value I seek, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $680000.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. We've considered your offer carefully and would like to counter with a price of $690000. We hope this meets your expectations and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your efforts to meet my expectations, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $685000.

We thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After reviewing your proposal, we have decided to counter with a price of $695000. We hope this offer will help us reach a satisfactory conclusion to this transaction.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value I seek, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $690000.
Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. After careful consideration, we have decided to counter with a price of $692500. We believe this offer strikes a balance between our interests and yours.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering the value I seek, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $690000.
